title: DestroyHandler state:deleted event
details:
BUG FIX v1.6.3.2: DestroyHandler now emits state:deleted event for manager panel sync.

Root cause: DestroyHandler.handleDestroy() only emitted QUICK_TAB_CLOSED event (legacy), but PanelContentManager listens for state:deleted event.

Fix in DestroyHandler.js:
Added _emitStateDeletedEvent() method that emits state:deleted event with { id, quickTab: { id, url, title } }

This allows the manager panel to update when Quick Tabs are closed from anywhere (not just the panel).
